subtitle: A tasty way to cook potatoes.

method.text: Par-boil the potatoes in salted boiling water for 5 min. Drain well, cool slightly.
Slice the potatoes. Sprinkle with salt.
Heat the oil in a frying pan. Fry the potato slices in batches until golden and skins are crispy. Drain on kitchen paper. Spoon onto a warmed serving dish.

title: Crunchy sauteed potatoes
